Today in Pembrokeshire, it's a bit rough with 9 ft @10s SW swell and fresh 21 mph SW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions remain poor with 5 ft @8s SW swell and similar winds. Day after, things improve with 5 ft @12s WSW swell and light 6 mph WNW winds, offering a clean window at spots like Whitesands Bay and Abereiddy. Best: day after.
